pr_title: Make text index query cache a configurable option

timeline.bodyText:
I'll suggest using
!textIndexProperties.get(FieldConfig.LUCENE_TEXT_INDEX_ENABLE_QUERY_CACHE).equalsIgnoreCase("true") instead of false, in case someone mis-spells the value.
timeline.author: jackjlli

timeline.bodyText: Put a comment above this line on how this cached will be used.
timeline.author: jackjlli
jackjlli

timeline.bodyText: Not related to this but can we remove the field.config. prefix from all these keys?
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

timeline.bodyText: Don't put the whole map here. The map contains all the properties, not for text column only. I think you can keep this config unchanged, but check the field config when loading the text index.
timeline.author: Jackie-Jiang

replies.bodyText: Done. Btw, FieldConfig contains a properties map Map<String, String> per column
